branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1M, Mechanically Jointed - Slide Bearing
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY1M Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. The integrated slide bearing internal guide provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
